EmailTemplate.name: Bike Parking Installed
EmailTemplate.subject: Installation Complete!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Your request for a {!Case.Type} on {!Case.Street_Address__c} {!Case.Street_Name__c} has been fulfilled. It was installed on {!Case.Install_Date__c}.
Please consider this an official notification that the request is now closed.
Thank you,
The San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency
